media:group.media:title: America's Wasteful Spending, Explained
media:group.media:description:
A breakdown of what makes the American government wasteful.

If you want to support the channel, here are the best ways to do it:

1) Watch the full video
2) Subscribe if you haven't
3) Share with a friend
4) Support me with a small donation on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/rchapman 

0:00 Intro
01:06 Inefficiency
10:29 Lobbying & Interest Groups
17:07 The Military
21:09 Outro

Sources:

The Federalist - Hamilton, Madison & Jay
The Constitution Of The United States
Red Tape - Herbert Kaufman
Bureaucracy - James Wilson
Interest Groups In American Politics - Anthony Nownes
Political Order And Political Decay - Francis Fukuyama
The Rent-Seeking Society - Gordon Tullock
The Rise And Decline Of Nations - Mancur Olson
So Damn Much Money - Robert Kaiser
Program Budgeting - William West
